website_summaries.verdict: A budget-minded shoe good for fitness classes and casual running.
pros: Comes in Chalk Coral, Core Black, Grey Two and White
Textile upper, structurally supportive mid-foot and heel cage
Rubber outsole designed for gripping and traction
cons: May run narrow, so keep this in mind when sizing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes, but size down!
customer_reviews.text: SIZE DOWN! I'm so lucky I browsed through some reviews before purchasing these shoes. Many people suggested to size down on these, so I ordered a 7, even though I'm a size 8 in every other shoe. The size 7 fit perfectly. They are soft, lightweight, comfortable and they look very nice. The material is very breathable, and the white rubber is easy to clean (especially with some peroxide). I'm definitely buying a second pair of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Lesbia

customer_reviews.title: They would also be great for casual shoes if you like a sporty aesthetic ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are VERY plush, particularly in the ankle and in the forefoot. I use them at the gym for "boot camp" and plyometric exercise classes. They would also be great for casual shoes if you like a sporty aesthetic and plan to be on your feet a while. The reason they lost a star for me is because they are marketed as running shoes and they are DEFINITELY NOT for running... They are heavier and foam-ier than I like for running and they get too hot and uncomfortable if you do any more than a 10 minute warm up run.
customer_reviews.author: Amber M

customer_reviews.title: Best sneakers I’ve worn in a decade
customer_reviews.text: The best sneakers I’ve worn in over a decade. I’ve paid $150 and more for good quality sneakers and I did not expect a sneaker at this price point to be so amazing. I wear 8.5, have a slightly wider than typical forefoot, slightly narrow heel and higher than typical arch. These fit perfect. Enough room for my forefoot without feeling immense pressure like the shoe is too tight (like in Nike sneakers). My heel is held in place and doesn’t slide around and get blisters. The foot bed has a luscious cushiony feel while still supporting my higher arch.
customer_reviews.author: F. Pagan

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe, but as you can see from my pictures it runs very large. My toes are a good inch or two from the edge of the shoe. I am a size 10 and purchased a 10, it fits like an 11. Would definitely order a size down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable! I work 12 hour shifts and these shoes have been great. They are wider than Nike air max shoes which for me made all the difference. I ordered a half a size up in case my feet swell during my shift and it seems to be a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Erin B.

customer_reviews.title: These are super comfortable for working out and running on the treadmill
customer_reviews.text: With Adidas, I always get a half a size smaller and they fit me perfectly! These are super comfortable for working out and running on the treadmill. Now if I could just figure out how to keep them clean..
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Fits true to size. Extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are SO comfortable and very cute! I am a true 8 and I purchased an 8 even though one review said they run large. The 8 fits perfectly. In my opinion, these are true to size. I have only had the shoes for a day now and I am already considering purchasing them in another color.
customer_reviews.author: TWest

customer_reviews.title: A mess & miss
customer_reviews.text: The barcode on the box and sneakers did not match. I could see glue on where the white part and black material meet. Looked sloppy and poor quality. I returned them also because, it they were not true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Iheartbooks

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than nearly identical older Adidas
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Adidas that are almost exactly like this shoe, they even have an identical sole. I bought them about 2 years ago and I love them so I wanted to buy the most similar shoe Adidas had on offer now, and this was it. I ordered the exact same size shoe and the holding the soles together this one is clearly a 1/2 size shorter than the older model of the nearly identical shoes. So Adidas must have changed their sizing in the last 2 years. Ordering a 1/2 size up and I'm fairly certain that will be the perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Great arch support and cushioning
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. I’ve worn clogs for years as a nurse, but had to switch to tennis shoes after having a plantar fasciotomy this summer. The shoe has just the right amount of arch support, that is very cushioning with each step. The color and design is really pretty as well. I never dreamed I’d wear anything but Dansko clogs for work, but these are my new favorite work shoes. If you’re someone who is on your feet for long hours then these shoes are perfect for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Great for less than a month...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, the fit was great, and as someone who needs good arch support, they function very well, and I haven't had back pain from running in them like I get from other shoes. HOWEVER, the insole began falling out less than a month after purchasing. And I thought it was just the lining and it would be fine, but it's the whole "CloudForm" bottom and if I take it out, the shoe becomes very hard and not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kamaron McNair

customer_reviews.title: Fit funky on my feet
customer_reviews.text: The color of the shoes is beautiful, but the design was bad for me. The whole toe of the shoes is mesh, which is awesome for getting airflow. The shoe then becomes a hard plastic right at the arch of my foot. It seemed only mildly annoying, so I gave them a chance. It seems that because of that mildly annoying piece of plastic, I have been putting extra stress on the outside of my foot and it's caused tendonitis. So, I'll be giving these shoes away. I've learned my lesson about buying shoes online.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Givens

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: I got the black/white combo and the black is more of a charcoal than black, which is a nice for switchin' it up. I walk about 3/4 a mile one-way just to class (at leash four or five miles total) everyday and they keep my feet from hurting. Only thing I can't stand is about after just a couple weeks, one shoe started squeaking and for the life of me I can't figure out what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little big, usually wear an 8.5-9 and sized down to an 8. Color is nice. Fairly comfortable. Low rating due to quality. Within 3 months the heel started peeling off and within 4 the inside of shoe is peeling. Now after having them less than 6 months I need a new pair. I wear them for walking only and they have never been worn outdoors. Very poor quality, will not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Light Road Running/Jogging
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a solid 7.5 in most shoes - with Adidas I always go with a 7 and it fits perfectly. I bought these to lightly jog in a few times a week. As an avid runner that used to only wear Mizuno, I can say that these are fantastic for light jogs and tempo training. Make sure you're sticking to road running - these would not do too well with cross country trails.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: VERY NICE BLACK VERSION OF ADIDAS CLOUDFOAM!
customer_reviews.text: There’s a lot of pictures for the White cloudfoam shoes so I thought I should upload some pictures of the black shoes. They are foam-like but it isn’t a squishy layer like the original adidas shoes. That’s probably because they’re for training and any more squish would make them heavy. They’re very comfortable. The insole is removable and the over all design is very nice. The only peculiar thing is the plastic, but it’s a very cool touch. They also come with the signature cute neon green cloudfoam keychain.
customer_reviews.author: Imani Cavazos

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love these sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn. I am serious. I have problem feet since child hood and I find it difficult to find a shoe that is comfortable all day and night. This is my new shoe and I want more Pairs. I have experience zero pain and 100% comfort. Thank you .
customer_reviews.author: emchyde

customer_reviews.title: Love them💙❤️💜
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are so comfortable and you don’t need to break them in. I wear them to the gym to all my classes.. hiit, kickboxing, body pump, and Zumba. I did read the reviews and went down in a half size and they fit perfect. I would recommend these to anyone looking for an awesome pair of shoes. By the way, the color is awesome. I bought the greenish color shoes and I receive so many compliments on the color.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Get them!
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9.5 in usually all sneakers like Nike’s..etc. these are true to size and I’m glad I didn’t size down...Although I think I’d be fine even if I did. My normal size fits and feels very comfortable and supportive without being bulky and large. Love the look very sleek! The only thing is it seems like the toe box of the shoe is meant for wide feet because it’s a little bigger. That’s why I think even if you sized half down it would also work. I love the shoes, perfect for the gym. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Great outgoing & gym shoes
customer_reviews.text: Adidas is one of my favorite brands. In order to let my feet feel more comfortable I order a half size up. I like this size 9 cause my toes can breath more while wearing it!! The upper is made with mesh and very comfortable and insole is soft and comfortable. I believe it's a very good one to wear for gym workout! The light apple green shoes just fits great with any outfit! Not only for exercising purpose but for casual wear looks great.
customer_reviews.author: L7H7Y7

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: They were comfortable at the beginning, but the material expands so my feet would feel as if they were floating around in the shoe. I couldn’t use my custom made inserts because it would make my feet tilt out and cause more pain. I would have given it a four, but just over a month of use they ripped beside the shoelace. I was so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Aceves

customer_reviews.title: GF really loved the look
customer_reviews.text: GF really loved the look, and wasn't disappointed. Feel is overall very comfortable. The only thing that she did not care for is the back somewhat lost it's ability to stand up when she puts them on and sometimes they "fold". It's easy just to pop back in place, and she says she's always been rough on shoes, but I have to question the quality a little as she doesn't wear them out much, or use them to work out in. So, overall 4/5 for looks and comfort, but would recommend something a little sturdier if you plan on using them to work out, as they would probably break down super quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these several months ago and when I tried them on, they were so tight around my feet. I have never tried on a pair of shoes in my regular size being that narrow. And I don't have wide feet. Not sure how other Adidas shoes fit, but I recommend getting a half to a size up on these. I didn't get another pair after I returned them because I just decided to get a shoe that actually fit in my regular size.
customer_reviews.author: crazyxcrunner

customer_reviews.title: Very cool and comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and unique looking. I got these shoes because I was going on a weekend trip requiring much walking. I didn't have any shoes with enough support, but these really exceeded my expectations. If walking or standing for many hours, I'd suggest adding a sole insert.
customer_reviews.author: Aowen222

customer_reviews.title: too wide and doesn't feel right
customer_reviews.text: I've probably had about 50 nike Shoes but decided to try Adidas and I usually run 10-15 miles a week. These are not comfortable. I've tried to break them in only for my feet to be sore. I have to wear double socks just for it to be comfortable. The mesh shoe feels too thin because you can literally see each TOE through my shoe. White is nice but the fit, the material and I haven't had a size problem before...maybe get a size smaller? im bummed out.
customer_reviews.author: meg andrews

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little big but so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new pair of Adidas just about every year! They're my favorite! They were a little big but I knew the size smaller would be too small! I love these shoes! Get lots of compliments! I have bad feet from my dads side & these help a lot! I walk my dog about 2 miles a day & they are perfect! I don't run or hike so I can't review about that.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great padding around the ankle. The laces start higher on the top of your foot than normal shoes and I think it makes it way more comfortable. You get more adjustment wear needed. I use these for up and downhill runs and outside stair climbing.
customer_reviews.author: lostinthought

customer_reviews.title: Lacking arch support, a bit too roomy for the size
customer_reviews.text: Comfy overall but the toe bed is very wide, sometimes causing me to slip forward in the show as I run. The design looks nice but the material is almost too flexible, doesn't give a ton of stability. For anyone with high arches, you will need to add inserts to these. I have medium arches and after my first run in them my arches were killing me. The inserts have helped a lot. Good for hiking, not ideal for running.
customer_reviews.author: Merril Louise

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but black wears off
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable! I wear a size 9.5-10 and would say that the 10 is snug. My only complaint is that after 9 months of wearing for mostly recreational purposes and occasional pickup volleyball, the black on the front toe cover is wearing off and they don’t look as nice.
customer_reviews.author: Stickmom

customer_reviews.title: Most appealing to woman with narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this pair for a child who has long, narrow feet. Fit is great, and the style is appropriate for a 9yr old. So grateful to find something that fits her, feels comfortable, and suites her style preferences.
customer_reviews.author: D. KRAMER

customer_reviews.title: Rear of both shoes have collapsed.
customer_reviews.text: Owned the shoe for less than one month and the rear portion of both shoes which could be called the "heel cup" have collapsed and basically fallen down into the shoe. I will be working with adidas to see if they will do anything to remedy the situation.
customer_reviews.author: TJ MORGAN

customer_reviews.title: Size is accurate, don't order a size down!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down (normally 8 and ordered a 7) due to many reviews recommending it--NOT right! I need a size 8, like normal. The 7 was much too small. Other than that, of course it's a spectacular shoe. Thought the padding did seem lighter than my old Adidas pair?
customer_reviews.author: Claire Love Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the style of these shoes, but I bought them as my primary running shoes and the quality is subpar. The heel cushion on both shoes squashed down within a couple of wears, so whenever I put them on it's all bunched up against the back of my heel. Obviously I can't run in them. But they're cute.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday
customer_reviews.text: Very nice/comfortable shoes all purpose shoes around town (I walk on average of 3-4 miles a day). Even tried them on couple spontaneous hikes. Had them for 3 months and LOVE them!
customer_reviews.author: PNWgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Use them for everyday athleisure, but also sturdy for hiking/long distance running
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing them for about three months now and really enjoy them. They're cute, comfortable, and fit really well! I tend to wear ankle socks with them during work outs so I don't get chaffing (hrs+ of activity) but short socks for everyday walking around at work. Love Adidas, love these shoes and would definitely buy them again! I also had an unrelated foot injury before getting these and the shoes have been very comfortable and supportive for my rehabilitation!
customer_reviews.author: Delaine Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love the fabric over my toes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. It's like wearing a soft T-shirt for your toes. The plastic side stripes are nice because they provide a tight support for the arch. I normally wear a 9 in regular shoes but I ordered a 9.5 because of the orthotic insert. Without the insert the 9 fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Love Adidas
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Adidas I’ve been wearing for almost 15 years that are in great shape. But I wanted to retire those to outside walking and use these for the gym. These are a great fit, I don’t think they are too big, but if you need width in the toe box, you’ll love Adidas. There’s no rubbing when walking or working out.
customer_reviews.author: L. Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Get a half size smaller!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a half size smaller than I typically wear, thanks to the reviews I read beforehand! These shoes are really comfortable and lightweight. The upper mesh fabric is stretchy, which is nice and my heels don't rub on the back of the shoe. I'm happy I chose these!
customer_reviews.author: angela

customer_reviews.title: Two Months In, Love These!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. They are very comfortable. I wear them walking, cycling and kicking around town in and they are holding up really well. I've gotten a lot of compliments on them. They go with everything. No rubbing or weird fit issues. I used to design shoes for a living so I'm pretty picky about aesthetics, quality and materials...for the price these are GREAT shoes!
customer_reviews.author: STL Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter says they are very comfortable. She's normally a 6.5 so that's what I ordered, perfect fit. She always wears hightops but these are for the gym so I went with regular sneaks.
customer_reviews.author: Northern Belle

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy & poor customer service from Adidas
customer_reviews.text: They’re not very comfortable. After wearing them a couple of days per week for work for about 2 months the right shoe started to make this weird popping sound every time I take a step. It sounds like a silly thing but it’s super annoying. I contacted Adidas and they haven’t even responded. Very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mazren

customer_reviews.title: Nice color in person ..love them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! I actually bought them to run in but they are so fashionable, I decided to keep them for taking care of errands and I bought a different pair of shoes to run in.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of shoes. They arrived in an Adidas box and everything was fine. Broke them in at Universal Studios and my feet were very happy. Great support, cushion and style. The kind of shoe you can wear athletically or with a nice pair of jeans. Very happy with this purchase. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cate Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I totally Love Adidas. Always my go to shoe for sneakers. Love the foam inside and the green key chain that says it’s foam. Very comfortable and universal for daily runs or exercising.
customer_reviews.author: LaNita M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this shoe for an outdoor musical festival and it was very comfortable. I wear a size 10 in women’s and bought my correct size and it was true to fit. The shoes were easy to clean and very breathable
customer_reviews.author: Melissa R

customer_reviews.title: they were comfortable but will be returning because they run too large
customer_reviews.text: they were comfortable but will be returning because they run too large. I am exactly a 7.5 but these are at least a half size too big. also they look fine but once on my feet they looked more like a mans shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Barajas

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are nice and she really liked them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my teenage daughter who started playing tennis this year. Shoes are nice and she really liked them. Smaid they were very comfy...until she actually played in them. The insole came out of place so every time she went to hard stop side to side she said she could feel the insole slipping under her foot. I ended up having to buy her insoles from Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luved at first , but the quality didn't last long , was torn toe mesh
customer_reviews.text: Fit was good , but the material ripped within 4 mos , and arch support gave out within 2 mos of work ?
customer_reviews.author: Missy Barrett

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I did not think I would like these shoes as much as I do! For the cost I thought they would be very cheaply made. I was wrong. I am very happy with these! Since getting back to the gym on the treadmill I am super pleased with how they feel, fit and hold up. Zero complaints! As a matter of fact I will be buying a second pair!
customer_reviews.author: N. Sedillo

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, good support!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these, I wore them when I was in NY and they were consistently comfortable throughout the day, and I wore them when I was running & the support was very good. They are a great choice for an every day sneaker & running shoe in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Zka

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable and cute shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever owned. Fits to size. Very cute also. Now I want them in every color.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I followed the other reviews and sized down.. ...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the other reviews and sized down... I wish I wouldn't have. Now I have to return and wait for my normal size to come. Don't size down!!
customer_reviews.author: Brit

customer_reviews.title: Thought I loved them :(
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! HOWEVER- without much use, the threading on the seams are already showing!
customer_reviews.author: Ljones

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: WOW, I walk a lot and I found these to be gems. Months later they are still in good condition. There is a runners limit, not sure what that would be. I plan to buy more next time I need a pair of sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Stinki

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I am a registered nurse and I’m typically on my feet and moving for a good 14 hours during a shift. These are better than any shoe I have ever bought for work. My feet aren’t even sore at the end of a shift. I actually have multiple pairs as back up
customer_reviews.author: Alypops

customer_reviews.title: Make my toes in pain
customer_reviews.text: When you wear them, your feet fell so comfortable, they are very soft. But after some certain distance of walking, my toes of both foot feel so pain! I wonder if I should take a size bigger or they don't have enough space at all?
customer_reviews.author: Thumper

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but the sole is a quite hard but ...
customer_reviews.text: I buyed a pair for my sister in size 9US. It run a quite strech in the front part, above the toes. Good quality but the sole is a quite hard but not uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Leandro V.

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and are a great workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and are a great workout shoe. The details in the craftsmanship is lacking since there are glue lines around the edges of the sole. If you can overlook that they shoe is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Leilani J. Boso

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I had to return shoes. It was too tight around the toe area. I have two other pair Adidas size 10 and they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Darnette Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, great quality, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, very comfortable. I hit all the stores within an hour trying to find a new pair of adidas I liked before deciding to purchase these. These were $25-40 less than anything else I found, an much better quality in my opinion. I’m very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sneaks
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable pair of sneakers I have owned. Like walking on a cloud. I’m always a 7.5 and they fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I love adidas sneakers. They always fit well and last a while for me as im on my feet 40+ hours a week. But these have to be the worst adidas I’ve ever gotten. The backs don’t hold up at all. I have to completely loosen the laces all the way to make sure the back doesn’t collapse as I’m putting them on and even then sometimes it still collapses. Won’t be buying these again
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable. Good for being on your feet long hours.
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving these shoes a low rating for the fact that the soles squeak as if they're wet or something sticky is on the bottom . No matter what surface . I had these shoes for work because I'm on my feet 12-16 hours a day and they are so comfortable! But this pair is so embarrassing because the squeaking is so loud.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Graff

customer_reviews.title: Order a size down if you like these to fit snug
customer_reviews.text: Order a size down if you like these to fit snug; they feel better if they fit snug. They are very lightweight and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Shanda

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why others said to size up but I’m glad I didn’t! I’m a size 9.5 and bought a 9.5 and they fit perfect. Super comfortable and will be great for a trip to LA next month.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Fits well feels nice. Not sure what others are expecting in terms of quality for a $40 shoe. It was intact and a nice design. Already went running in them and they are very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Even though I paid less than other store offers I'm still annoyed that with wearing them less than a week they're ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are made a little more on the cheap side. Even though I paid less than other store offers I'm still annoyed that with wearing them less than a week they're already falling apart and I doubt will last long.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Unbalanced
customer_reviews.text: Runs large. I’m normally a 10.5-11 (narrow) and the 10 fit wide with room to spare. That said, I returned this item because the heel is uneven (lower on the outer edge) and threw me off balance. I don’t know if it’s a design flaw, but the only time I’ve seen a heel like that is on a running shoe that’s been worn down.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Christopher

customer_reviews.title: And the black part runs off easily showing white underneath
customer_reviews.text: They're comfy and breath well, but where the white sole is actually 1/2 white and 1/2 black. And the black part runs off easily showing white underneath. My shoes aren't even that old but they look old. Sad face.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Ruark

customer_reviews.title: Another win for Adidas
customer_reviews.text: As always, Adidas delivers a quality and comfortable shoe. The design is classic and they keep my feet supported while I am at the gym.
customer_reviews.author: jcros830

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality cute
customer_reviews.text: I usually order a larger size in running shoes but these were way too big. I compared them to the same size Nike running shoe I own and it was bigger. What a shame since they are very cute.
customer_reviews.author: LynelSlayer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: They were not as vibrant in color as pictured. Other than that they fit great, I wear a size 6 and they were true to size with a little extra toe room.
customer_reviews.author: Cathycat

customer_reviews.title: The insoles are not nearly as comfortable as I expected compared to other adidas I own ...
customer_reviews.text: The insoles are not nearly as comfortable as I expected compared to other adidas I own - I wouldn't repurchase but perfectly fine product and they look nice and fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Blair Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Adidas run large
customer_reviews.text: Love the cloud, so soft! I purchased a 9.5 because I like space for my toes when I jog or play sports. But 9.5 was huge! I ordered the 9 and thought it would fit perfect, which it does but was hoping for a smidge more room. I really enjoy them nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Hillyard

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel great. I use them for team sports on asphalt ...
customer_reviews.text: If you've ordered Adidas shoes in the past, order the same size as your other Adidas shoes and they should fit the same. Adidas shoes have a wide toe box which works for those who need it. These particular sneakers are no exception. They look and feel great. I use them for team sports on asphalt and hockey dek and are comfortable on both.
customer_reviews.author: abby

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great for day to day wear. Look good. Comfy. Can also run in them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Gorlick

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reasonable cost
customer_reviews.text: I needed these for work and standing long hours during the day (12+ hours). They work and are stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Bose Urieko

customer_reviews.title: Runs big
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a more snug fit. I bought ASICS at 9/12, and these feel like the same size at 9. I decided to keep them but won’t likely run in them because they aren’t snug enough.
customer_reviews.author: Silent til I speak

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Adidas shoes for walking and they are just right. The Adidas fit is always good for me, just a little roomy, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: mustang girl

customer_reviews.title: Wore them more than eight hours, I walked about 15,000 steps and my feet felt pretty good. Usually they feel achy with my other
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Wore them more than eight hours, I walked about 15,000 steps and my feet felt pretty good. Usually they feel achy with my other shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Love the design, great shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: Loooove these shoes especially for the price. The design is sleek but very breathable. It's not the most comfortable shoe in the world, but for it's price, I take them to the gym with me every day and don't have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cope

customer_reviews.title: Oddly Sized
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice-looking, but for some reason, the right was smaller than the left. This made them unwearable, and back to Amazon they went.
customer_reviews.author: Babsie

customer_reviews.title: US6/EU36 M
customer_reviews.text: The toe box is really wide.... which makes wearing this while running really weird. So I use these just for regular gym sessions or running around town on errands. I would not recommend these for actual running.
customer_reviews.author: Maaret Hämäläinen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I returned these shoes. The color is NOT at all as pictured. These were ugly and for the brief time I wore them they were not comfortable and they fit small.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: True to size. And the best part of it it's the feel of walking on clouds, that's the best feeling ever. It doesn't make a sound when you're walking with them.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Had these shoes from Februrary to May, only used while at work, sitting at a desk. Everytime I walk it makes this clicking like sound, as if an air pocket has popped. Super annoying.
customer_reviews.author: F. Brumm

customer_reviews.title: but overall great tennis shoes
customer_reviews.text: Not as soft as I was hoping for and a little big, but overall great tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: bizk11

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They are so light and the soles are very comfortable. I have worn them almost every day for around 2.5 months and they show no sign of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Machine washable!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a bright white pair of tennis shoes. These shoes clean up nicely after washing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my time and money
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable shoe. My feet hurt so bad, just after wearing them for an hour. I had to change shoes .
customer_reviews.author: cool

customer_reviews.title: Looks slightly more like a "dad" shoe in real life than it does ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks slightly more like a "dad" shoe in real life than it does in the photo. Very comfortable, but the soles started detaching and falling apart after about 2 months of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad that I read all the reviews that advised to ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad that I read all the reviews that advised to order a half or full size down. I ordered a half size down and with socks they fit perfectly. They are very comfortable. I purchased the all white and it looks just like the picture. For $37, a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: true shoe lover

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: They are light... I use them at the gym. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Sebz

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy...my husband has these in the mens black and he told me how comfortable they were. I bought these to see and I'm not disappointed. Fits as expected. I usually wear a 6 and 6 fits great. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis texas

customer_reviews.title: Sadly disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I literally wore them for an entire day. I did about 10 hours of walking outside on pavement and some dirt areas; regular walking no climbing or intense working out and they have a small hole now in both the big toes. For the price I paid I am very upset and felt others should know this before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The inner sole keeps sliding
customer_reviews.text: The inner sole of the shoe keeps sliding and coming out since the day we purchased it. My daughter is really uncomfortable with it. Otherwise this is a great shoe.
customer_reviews.author: NGeneva

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for running. There is plenty of toe room and the cushy sole is fantastic. In most running shoes, I would order a full size up in order to have plenty of toe room, but I do not need to do that with Adidas.
customer_reviews.author: justagirl

customer_reviews.title: Looks like Im going for a fancy work out with my trainer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Very cute and comfy for the gym. You see what you get. Usually size 7 in sneakers but went with the 6.5 & glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Joan Yedid

customer_reviews.title: but I ended up returning because the toe bed wasn't comfortable on my foot
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoes, but I ended up returning because the toe bed wasn't comfortable on my foot. Would consider ordering again in maybe a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: L.B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable great looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy and I get compliments on them all of the time. Last night I walked through a muddy area and the mud EASILY rinsed right off of them. Fits as expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessika Tischleder

product_meta.title: adidas Women's Energy Cloud V Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Let your mind wander as the miles fly by. These women's running shoes have a super plush feel with a breathable textile upper. The cloudfoam midsole offers responsive cushioning, while a supportive midfoot cage gives you steady lockdown.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
a supportive cage wraps around the midfoot for a locked-down fit
cloudfoam midsole for step-in comfort and superior cushioning
adiwear outsole offers the ultimate in high-wear durability
